translation: Therefore, we should not kill the sons of Dhritarashtra, our relatives; for how can we be happy by killing our own kin, O Madhava (Krishna)?
commentary: 1.37 Therefore therefore? not (are) not? Arhah justified? We we? to kill to kill? Dhritarashtra the sons of Dhritarashtra? Svabandhavan our relatives? relatives kinsmen? Hi indeed? How how? killing having killed? Sukhinah happy? Syam may (we) be? Madhava O Madhava.No Commentary.
